portlet.title: Project Calendar
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a calendar.

portlet.title: Image
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a single image and link

portlet.title: News
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a listing of recent news

portlet.title: Events
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a listing of recent events

portlet.title: Login
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a log-in box

portlet.title: Navigation
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a navigation tree

portlet.title: Recent items
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a listing of recently changed items.

portlet.title: Recent items-No date
portlet.description: A portlet which can render a listing of recently changed items, but without dates.

portlet.title: Events-No date
portlet.description: A portlet which shows recent events, but without dates.

portlet.title: News-No date
portlet.description: A portlet which shows the news, but without dates.

portlet.title: RSS Feed
portlet.description: A portlet which can receive and render an RSS feed.

portlet.title: Search
portlet.description: A portlet which shows a search box.
